cause.description:
Basically, the plan is to donate money, Bibles and other literature to men and women who are struggling for the faith in other parts of the world, where the freedom to be a Christian is not available.
1. Jesus is the true and living Son fo God, who came down in the flesh from the a virgin named Mary, spent 3 years of His life preaching and ministering God's Word and His Love and then died on the cross. After which, He arose on the third day and is seated
2. Although, the Bible does say that Christians will be persecuted (John 15:20), the Bible still states that we should help those that cannot help themselves (Proverbs 31:8).
3. With the help of God all this can and will be accomplished by the divine grace of the Living GOD.
cause.mission: Protect and Help the Persecuted Saved
cause.name: Jars Of Clay
